abstract: Vikram S. Pandit has not been perfect as chief executive of Citigroup, but most of the bank’s problems preceded him.
snippet: Vikram S. Pandit has not been perfect as chief executive of Citigroup, but most of the bank’s problems preceded him.
lead_paragraph: Vikram S. Pandit did not dig the hole at Citigroup. Yet many people, both inside and outside the giant bank, still wonder if he can hang on as chief executive.

byline.original: By Rob Cox and Dwight Cass

abstract: The Dow and the S&P 500-stock index gained Thursday, breaking a three-day losing streak, as data on the job market and regional manufacturing revived hope.
snippet: The Dow and the S&P 500-stock index gained Thursday, breaking a three-day losing streak, as data on the job market and regional manufacturing revived hope.
lead_paragraph: The Dow and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index gained on Thursday, breaking a three-day losing streak, as data on the job market and regional manufacturing revived hope that the economy was stabilizing.

headline.main: Stocks Rise Moderately on Jobless Data
